summary.para: Gets a copy of the current enumeration.

param.name: ppenum
param.para: The address of a pointer that receives a copy of this enumeration.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets an array of one or more interfaces from the enumeration.

param.name: celt
param.para: The number of elements in the array referenced by the rgelt parameter.

param.name: rgelt
param.para: The address of an array of pointers to interfaces that receive the enumerated item or items. The calling application is responsible for freeing the IShellItem interfaces by calling the method.

param.name: pceltFetched
param.para: A pointer to a value that receives the number of interfaces successfully retrieved. The count can be smaller than the value specified in the celt parameter. This parameter can be NULL on entry only if celt is one, because in that case the method can only retrieve one item and return S_OK, or zero items and return S_FALSE.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: if at least interface was retrieved.
if there are no more interfaces in the enumeration.
Returns an error value if the function fails for any other reason.

summary.para: Resets the internal count of retrieved interfaces in the enumeration.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Skips a given number of interfaces in the enumeration. Used when retrieving interfaces.

param.name: celt
param.para: The number of interfaces to skip.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes enumeration of interfaces. This interface is typically obtained by calling the IEnumShellItems method.
